creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude couple at a bed at center, one figure seated and the other standing; richly decorated, dark room; basket of fruit or yarn on the floor, sickle at L; at R, dark scene with sheep and crucifixes in URC; whole image is framed by arched beams
marks:
in graphite inside mat: 953

letterhead with p
provenance: [William Weston Gallery, London, no. 2492/5; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Chamber Idyll
